title: By the King, a proclamation for a general fast
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
publisher: Printed by John Bill, Thomas Newcomb, and Henry Hills ...,
notes: "Given at our court at Whitehall the twenty eighth day of March 1679. In the one and thirtieth year of our reign."
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
